title: Introduction
description: A CLI to start projects structured, with the best technologies and most used. Simple, smart and scalable.
content:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:t}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const r={a:"a",em:"em",h2:"h2",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...i.components};return t(e,{children:[n(r.p,{children:"We offer a lot of project templates, to front-end, back-end and both."}),"
",n(r.p,{children:n(r.strong,{children:"How Todoroki works?"})}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"You will install the CLI using the documentation right here, and with it you can choose the best structure to your project..."}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"The process of install each package and set it all up sometimes can be a little boring."}),"
",n(r.p,{children:n(r.em,{children:n(r.strong,{children:"Use Todoroki and be fast to do it."})})}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"inspirations",children:"Inspirations"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Here are some projects that inspired to build Todoroki:"}),"
",t(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:n(r.a,{href:"https://kanpeki.vercel.app/",children:"Kanpeki"})}),"
",n(r.li,{children:n(r.a,{href:"https://uploadthing.com/",children:"Upload Thing"})}),"
",n(r.li,{children:n(r.a,{href:"https://ui.shadcn.com/",children:"shadcnUI"})}),"
",n(r.li,{children:n(r.a,{href:"https://magicui.design/",children:"MagicUI"})}),"
",n(r.li,{children:n(r.a,{href:"https://ui.aceternity.com",children:"Aceternity UI"})}),"
"]})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:t}=e.components||{};return t?n(t,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Next.js Template

",n(r.h2,{id:"used-technologies",children:"Used Technologies"}),"
",n(r.h3,{id:"biome",children:"Biome"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"The project use Biome to lint and format the code."}),"
",n("small",{class:"text-primary font-bold text-sm",children:n(r.em,{children:"Why use Biome?"})}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:["
",i(r.p,{children:["Biome is about ",n(r.strong,{children:"35x faster"})," than Prettier"]}),"
"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:["
",n(r.p,{children:"Avoid obscure error messages, when we tell you something is wrong, they tell
you exactly where the problem is and how to fix it."}),"
"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:["
",n(r.p,{children:"Out of the box support for all the language features you use today. First
class support for TypeScript and JSX."}),"
"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:["
",n(r.p,{children:"With tight internal integration they are able to reuse previous work and any
improvement to one tool improves them all."}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(c,{href:"https://biomejs.dev/",variant:"outline",children:n(r.p,{children:"Biome Documentation"})}),"
",n(r.h3,{id:"ky-for-http-requests",children:"Ky for HTTP requests"}),"

",n("small",{class:"text-primary font-bold text-sm",children:n(r.em,{children:"Why use Ky?"})}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:["
",n(r.p,{children:"Method shortcuts (ky.post())"}),"
"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:["
",n(r.p,{children:"Treats non-2xx status codes as errors (after redirects)"}),"
"]}),"

"]}),"

"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:["
",n(r.p,{children:"Retries failed requests"}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"

It's way better than Shadcn, it offers accessible components with all properties and some useful hooks to improve the user experience"]})})}),"
"]}),"
